Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.acra.util.ApplicationStartupProcessor
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.acra.config.CoreConfiguration.deleteOldUnsentReportsOnApplicationStart()
    org.acra.file.CrashReportFileNameParser.isApproved(String)
    use ReportLocator.getApprovedReports() and ReportLocator.getUnapprovedReports() instead
    org.acra.config.CoreConfiguration.reportSenderFactoryClasses()
    org.acra.config.CoreConfigurationBuilder.setDeleteOldUnsentReportsOnApplicationStart(boolean)
    use @AcraLimiter.deleteReportsOnAppUpdate() instead
    org.acra.config.CoreConfigurationBuilder.setReportSenderFactoryClasses(Class<? extends ReportSenderFactory>...)
    register with plugin loading instead
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    org.acra.annotation.AcraCore.deleteOldUnsentReportsOnApplicationStart
    use @AcraLimiter.deleteReportsOnAppUpdate() instead
    org.acra.annotation.AcraCore.reportSenderFactoryClasses
    register with plugin loading instead
